Bash(powershell -Command "Set-Location ''C:\\Users\\nitsa\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\VIIDEO''; git commit -m @''
Add blend mode system, settings panel, zoom, HLS caching, and UI overhaul

- CSS mix-blend-mode rendering with 17 blend modes and protection system
- Settings panel with import/export \(MixSnapshot to JSON, localStorage persistence\)
- Canvas zoom/pan and per-video zoom/pan with proper edge clamping
- HLS segment caching via Cache API
- Invisible fill-bar faders with percentage label above finger
- Mini button opacity progress border \(blue fill around 3 sides\)
- Side-panel Library and BlendModeSelector
- Edit mode: no visual layer changes, orange outline outside border
- Mini buttons touch screen bottom edge \(y > 1.0 past safe area\)
- TapToLoad redesigned as black square
- Exit edit button replaces fullscreen button in edit mode

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
